detail_desc: Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Super push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, striped, crinkled viscose with narrow elastication, a flounce and an opening with ties at the top. Short sleeves with flounced trims.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves. Seamless.
Paper straw hat with ears, embroidery and a glittery grosgrain band around the brim. Width of brim approx. 3.5 cm.
Wide, ankle-length culottes in washed, stretch denim. Regular waist with covered elastication, a fake fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Jumpsuit in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with flounces at the front that continue along the shoulder straps to the back. Seam at the waist with wide elastication at the back, side pockets and wide, 3/4-length legs.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with long sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
Ankle boots in imitation nubuck with a padded edge, lacing at the front, pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm.
Lightly padded jersey hat in the shape of a strawberry with a felt appliqué on top and elastication around the hem. Lined.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.

Blouse in an airy viscose weave with lace trims, and a yoke with lace frill trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a lace frill trim at the cuffs.
Long, fine-knit jacket with notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Metal hair clips with glittery decorations. Length 4 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Garter-stitched all-in-one suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch. Raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Short jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Short-sleeved shirt in soft, washed cotton with a collar and a small embroidery detail on the chest. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and a yoke with a loop at the back.

Short-sleeved polo shirt and a pair of matching shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Shirt with a collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, and wide legs with short slits at the hems.
Soft faux fur jacket with a lined hood with ear-shaped appliqués. Press-stud fastening and patch pockets at the front. Lined.

Long dress with a bodice in lace and skirt in an airy weave. Scalloped V-neck with support panels at the top, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves with scalloped cuffs, a seam at the waist with a grosgrain band, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Shirt in a softly draping viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, low dropped shoulders and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. One open chest pocket, and short slits in the sides.
Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a faux fur pompom on the top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem with an appliqué.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist.
Fabric-covered, steel wire hairband that can be opened out and tied in different ways. Length approx. 74 cm.
Trousers in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with a button. Side pockets and one fake welt back pocket with a button.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with a high, wrapover funnel collar with a decorative drawstring at the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Smocked seam at the waist and a rounded hem.
Sandals in grained imitation leather with a toe strap, narrow straps at the heel and around the ankle and a metal buckle with elastic.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck front and back, long sleeves and a gathered seam with narrow elastication down the front.
Short, sleeveless dress in sequined mesh with a deep V-neck front and back. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Fine-knit socks in soft chenille with elasticated tops.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace made from a silk blend with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Joggers in a soft, fine knit with a high, elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.
Short, 5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit with a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cap in woven fabric with text embroidery at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slit at the front.
Imitation leather sandals with straps with a hook and loop fastening and a loop at the back. Moulded fabric insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 70x200 cm.
Keyring in metal and faux fur. Length approx. 16 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a high waist and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Satin top with a gently draped neckline and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Pre-tied bow tie in a satin weave with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist, pleats at the top and a belt with a buckle. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, and side pockets.
ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, short, wide sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress with a lace top and pleated skirt in woven fabric. Round neck, a seam at the waist with a lace frill trim and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and ribbed neckline.
Short skirt in washed stretch denim with worn details and concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist. Zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a raw-edge hem.
Push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastener at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long, straight-cut tunic in a crêpe weave with wide pin-tucks at the front, a V-neck and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Cropped top in soft fabric with a round neckline and short sleeves. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Chinos in extra-stretchy cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Knee-length dress in ribbed jersey with a ballerina neckline front and back, 3/4-length sleeves, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
High-waisted jeggings in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.

Shoulder bag in nylon with imitation leather piping, a zip at the top and an adjustable shoulder strap with a plastic buckle. One zipped outer compartment and one small inner compartment. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Width 16 cm. Height 22 cm.
No-show sports socks in fine-knit, fast-drying functional yarn. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Pull-on trousers in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Wedge-heel sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 9 cm.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered appliqué on the chest, long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
Coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, low dropped shoulders, side pockets and no fasteners. Lined.
Shorter windbreaker in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front and welt side pockets with a press-stud. Wide elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in light slub cotton jersey with a lined hood, zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in slightly stretchy cotton twill with a regular waist and zip fly. Side pockets, flap back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.

Foldaway weekend bag in woven fabric with two handles and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. One large compartment with a two-way zip, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment into which the bag can be easily folded and enclosed. Practical carry strap when the bag is folded away. Size 20x30x43 cm. Size when folded 21x31 cm.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Suede slingbacks with pointed toes and an adjustable strap around the heel with a metal buckle. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 9 cm.
Imitation suede espadrilles with open sides, an adjustable strap with a metal fastener at the back and a braided jute trim around the soles. Cotton canvas linings, jute insoles and rubber soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
